nodes.text: Rat was a male Human who worked as an information broker on the moon Nar Shaddaa during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

In 3 ABY, Rat met with a group of Rebel Alliance agents on Nar Shaddaa, whom sought to learn information regarding the Dark Jedi Thaum Rystra. However, the Hutt Brinojja sent a group of thugs to capture Rat, and they attacked Rat and the agents. The agents subsequently fled Nar Shaddaa in their YT-1300 light freighter Lazy Katarn, and Rat accompanied them.
